DomainNameArn.description: The ARN of the domain name.

IpAddressType.description: The IP address types that can invoke an API (RestApi) or a DomainName. Use `ipv4` to allow only IPv4 addresses to invoke an API or DomainName, or use `dualstack` to allow both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses to invoke an API or a DomainName. For the `PRIVATE` endpoint type, only `dualstack` is supported.

Types.description: A list of endpoint types of an API (RestApi) or its custom domain name (DomainName). For an edge-optimized API and its custom domain name, the endpoint type is `"EDGE"` . For a regional API and its custom domain name, the endpoint type is `REGIONAL` . For a private API, the endpoint type is `PRIVATE` .

EndpointConfiguration.description: The endpoint configuration to indicate the types of endpoints an API (RestApi) or its custom domain name (DomainName) has and the IP address types that can invoke it.

description: The `AWS::ApiGateway::DomainNameV2` resource specifies a custom domain name for your private APIs in API Gateway. You can use a private custom domain name to provide a URL for your private API that's more intuitive and easier to recall.

CertificateArn.description: The reference to an AWS -managed certificate that will be used by the private endpoint for this domain name. AWS Certificate Manager is the only supported source.

DomainName.description: Represents a custom domain name as a user-friendly host name of an API (RestApi).

EndpointConfiguration.description: The endpoint configuration to indicate the types of endpoints an API (RestApi) or its custom domain name (DomainName) has and the IP address types that can invoke it.

Policy.description: A stringified JSON policy document that applies to the `execute-api` service for this DomainName regardless of the caller and Method configuration. You can use `Fn::ToJsonString` to enter your `policy` . For more information, see [Fn::ToJsonString](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/intrinsic-function-reference-ToJsonString.html) .

SecurityPolicy.description: The Transport Layer Security (TLS) version + cipher suite for this DomainName. Only `TLS_1_2` is supported.

Tags.description: The collection of tags. Each tag element is associated with a given resource.
